name: Strugglesaurus
description:
ARROWS - move around and interact
SPACE - shoot
F5 - restart the game

Notes: in gamejam version there's little progression and you can't get past the mine. Not sure if this will be developer further just yet.

Global Game Jam 2022 project by Aurimas Garuolis and Paulius Sagaitis.
Theme: Duality.

Special credits: 
Šarūnas Ledas (SFX hunter)
Faux (soundtrack) https://soundcloud.com/faux_hex
